subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Fresh off the first undefeated Patriot League regular season and a second-straight N.C.A.A. tournament appearance, the midmajor power Bucknell is eager take down college basketball’s big guns again.
snippet: Fresh off the first undefeated Patriot League regular season and a second-straight N.C.A.A. tournament appearance, the midmajor power Bucknell is eager take down college basketball’s big guns again.
